MSPM-CBL-2025-12-20-001

START CABLE

SUMMARY

This is a sample Cable used to validate the build pipeline and the locked format.

FACTS

  • Source Markdown is ASCII-only.
  • The build produces HTML, PDF, and a feed entry.
  • The SHA-256 value is computed from canonical text derived from this source.

ASSESSMENT

This repository scaffolds the end-to-end artifact generation and strict lint rules.

OUTLOOK

Future Cables replace this placeholder content with operational situational awareness.

END CABLE
